channel.title: Help
channel.description: Ok so how do I make an NPC say something like if I built a shop the NPC said the shop name so how?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You change it in your shops configuration file.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1 && misc.random2(20) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
					}

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1 && misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = " Range shop! "; }

this would work
[/quote]
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Then change the text.

To make the interface say a shop name then i think that is part of wanneshop method.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Burnzcanzpwnz Burnzcanzpwnz
item.description:
@Burnzcanzpwnz wrote:

[quote=“FinalFantasy, post:2, topic:268202”]put this in your NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1 && misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "There are " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!"; }

This would make a man say how many players are online[/quote] I want an NPC say a shop name!

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

put this in your NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1 && misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "There are " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!"; }

This would make a man say how many players are online

Read full topic
